snippet: Yahoo named the president of PayPal, Scott Thompson, as its new chief executive to help revitalize the struggling Internet company.
abstract: Yahoo named the president of PayPal, Scott Thompson, as its new chief executive to help revitalize the struggling Internet company.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo named the president of PayPal, Scott Thompson, as its new chief executive to help revitalize the struggling Internet company. Mr. Thompson succeeds Yahoo's former chief, Carol Bartz, who was fired in September as earnings stagnated while competitors like Facebook and Google flourished. Read more »

headline.main: Yahoo Names PayPal President as C.E.O.
